meanings.definition: A large deer with antlers found in northern regions.
meanings.sent1: The reindeers grazed peacefully in the snowy forest.
meanings.sent2: We saw a herd of reindeers crossing the icy river.
meanings.sent3: The reindeers decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a herd of reindeers, each thought racing in different directions.
meanings.sent5: The image of the majestic reindeers against the white landscape was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: Santa's sleigh was pulled by reindeers in the Christmas parade.
meanings.sent2: The children were excited to see the reindeers at the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The reindeers gathered around the watering hole, chatting about their day.
meanings.sent4: The reindeers on the holiday cards seemed to leap off the paper.
meanings.sent5: The reindeers' hooves made a rhythmic sound on the frozen ground.
